reviewText: Just make sure you have a dvd player that will play this.

Although this product says "all region" it does not play on any of three dvd players I tested it on. I have a number of other Zouzounia dvds that say "all region" and they play perfectly fine on said dvd players, however this Ax! Kounelaki dvd does not. Dvd players all say "cannot play back dvd due to area limitations." I am very disappointed as this purchase is now useless.
